title: 041 - Mullet Mitt Joins The Pod
description: On today's show, the office's new intern Mullet Mitt joins the show. The boys put him into the hot seat and fire questions at him from every angle to get to know him better. They also discuss some of their weekend plans, the SHAHK gang getting ready to swim, and a slew of other things. Keep an eye out for a Memorial Day merch sale with 20% off everything at store.patmcafeeshow.com. Have a safe weekend. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
